EmailTemplate.subject: Continuously Develop and Deploy your Java/Spring app on Pivotal Web Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
You already have an understanding of Spring. Now it's time to leverage your knowledge and build an application with Pivotal Web Services. There you can host the applications and services you’ve built using Spring Boot and Spring framework on production-ready infrastructure in minutes - getting your users to those “magic moments” faster than ever before.
Pivotal Web Services (PWS) is delivered by the same company that sponsors the Spring Framework. Indeed, spring.io <[[https://spring.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=E2-spring.io-pws-default]]> is hosted on PWS. Features and benefits include:
- Push your Spring Boot file straight to PWS in minutes (no need to install or configure servers) enabling faster deployment. - The PWS marketplace offers instant service connections for many popular databases, message brokers, registry services, monitoring, metrics and more enabling faster business transactions. - The PWS Java <[[https://docs.run.pivotal.io/buildpacks/java/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=E2-java-pws-default]]> Buildpack auto-configures database connections, message queues etc. to provide more time for to deliver more. - Automatic routing with instant URLs mean your apps are immediately available from the web, increasing speed of deployment. - Instant, scalability, on-demand or auto-scaling make you more productive
Sign up for your free trial here <[[https://run.pivotal.io/spring/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=E2-freetrial-pws-default]]> and receive $87US of free trial credit, no credit card required to push your Spring Application onto PWS.
Thanks,
The Pivotal Team
